itunes:author: iBooks
title: Nick Cave: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The musician-turned-novelist thrills a rapt audience with a live reading.
itunes:summary: Musician and author Nick Cave thrills the audience at the iTunes Festival with a reading from his book, "The Death of Bunny Munro." Now available on iTunes, the audiobook version is read by the Australian rocker himself.
itunes:keywords: Nick Cave, itunes festival, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
